content.value:
338 Home Hosting is a lodging house located south of Cali. Nearby are different tourist places, medical areas to rededir Imbanaco clinic, universities, and party sites. A very quiet neighborhood but with access to places of food, shopping, and easy transportation.

We have 6 spacious rooms, each equipped with television, desk, personal chair, towels and closet. The rooms have a private bathroom and we also offer the availability with shared bathroom. Can be accommodated between 1 or two people per room

Situated in Cali, within 1.2 km of Pan-American Park and 2.6 km of Cañaveralejo's Bullring, 338 Home Hosting features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is set 4.3 km from Saint's Peter Cathedral, 4.3 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater and 5 km from La Ermita Church. The guest house has family rooms.
All rooms at the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen and a dining area. The units have a desk.

National Natural Park Farallones de Cali is 27 km from 338 Home Hosting, while Jorge Garcés Borrero Library is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International, 25 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: 338 Home Hosting is a lodging house located south of Cali. It was remodeled in 2016 and has the basic elements so that your stay is pleasant. It offers the public the rental of a private apartment with 4 bedrooms and three bathrooms with dining room, kitchen and laundry room or the individual rental of any of the 6 rooms available with private bathroom or shared bathroom. Parking and Internet access are free.
